00008 Point_nD<double,2> NurbsCurve<double,2>::normal(double u, const Point_nD<double,2>& v) const{
00009   cerr << "YOU CAN'T COMPUTE THE NORMAL in 2D of a 2D vector!\n" ; 
00010   return firstDn(u) ;
00011 }
